action.action-desc: Mr. Takano (for himself and Mr. Bost) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to provide for a definition of establishment, determination, or adjustment of employee compensation for purposes of the collective bargaining of certain Department of Veterans Affairs employees.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the VA Correct Compensation Act of 2023.

section.header: Definition of establishment, determination, or adjustment of employee compensation for purposes of the collective bargaining of certain Department of Veterans Affairs employees
section.text: Subsection (c) of section 7422 of title 38, United States Code, is amended to read as follows:

paragraph.text: The term professional conduct or competence means any of the following:
The term establishment, determination, or adjustment of employee compensationâ€”

subparagraph.text: means setting a rate of pay as required by applicable law, rule, or regulation; and

does not include a grievance challenging whether an employee described in section 7421(b) of this title has received the correct compensation as required by law, rule, regulation, or binding agreement.
